content: end pm start of thumb gusset sts m1 2nd side m1 pm end of thumb gusset sts knit to end ● round 2 & 3 k every st ● repeat rnds 1 2 & 3 until there are a total of 12 16 20 thumb sts between 2nd and 3rd markers ● knit to 2nd marker and remove it slip the 12 16 20 thumb gusset sts to piece of scrap yarn remove 3rd marker knit to end of round fingers ● k every st for 3 5 4 4 5 inches ● decrease round k1 sm k2tog knit to last 3 sts of first side k2tog k1 repeat for 2nd side ● next round k all sts of round ● repeat last 2 rounds until only 20 sts remain 10 on each needle ● kitchener the remaining sts thumbs ● pu the 12 16 20 thumb sts with the circular needle removing the scrap yarn as you go then pu 4 more sts from mitten ● knit 18 20 22 rnds ● k2tog all stitches around to end cut yarn leaving a 10 inch tail using a yarn needle run the tail yarn through all the stitches and draw them closed weave in the yarn to secure it and push it to the inside of the mitten repeat process for remaining 3 thumbs finishing ● weave in all yarn ends to secure them and hide them inside ● repeat all for a matching mitten ● insert one mitten into the other mitten resulting in double thickness mitten when mittens get wet from playing in the snow pull them apart to hasten the drying process © beverly tilton beverly is yarn crazy2
